entry.title: Yaki Straight 360 Lace Frontal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: 360 Lace Frontal
Price: 234.00 - 325.00 (6 variants)

 Yaki Straight 360 Lace Frontal

Part in any direction with our 4"x 22" hand tied 360 Lace Crown Closure. No hair left out for a full weave, great protective style & very natural weave look. 

Our hand tied lace frontal covers your hairline all the way around  giving you the most natural weave hairline. With the perfect install, the invisible lace lays flat against your skin. For some, it is the perfect finish to every weave. 

Blogs & More

Check out our blog post, What is a 360 Lace Frontal? for more information. Also, if you're not sure how many bundles you'll need, check out our check out our Bundles Guide

entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada

Price: 234.00 - 325.00 (6 variants)

 Body Wave 360 Lace Frontal

Part in any direction with our 4"x 22" hand tied 360 Lace Crown Closure. No hair left out for a full weave, great protective style & very natural weave look. 

Our hand tied lace frontal covers your hairline all the way around  giving you the most natural weave hairline. With the perfect install, the invisible lace lays flat against your skin. For some, it is the perfect finish to every weave. 

Our most popular luxuriously textured hair extensions. The texture is large wavy and it holds curls very well. It is also versatile and can easily be straightened or curled & washing it brings back the original texture. Body Wave is popular because it holds volume and also looks natural when straight.

entry.title: Kinky Curly Lace Closure
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Lace Closure
Price: 115.00 - 185.00 (6 variants)

Kinky Curly Lace Closure

Our Kinky Curly texture is the perfect blend for the natural look. The texture is a tight spiral curl. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture.

What's it for?

For a full head of weave without hair left out, our 4"x 4" lace closures are perfect for closing the weave. Natural looking protective style weave closure with free, single, 3 & V part.

Our hand tied lace closure covers the middle of your hair, including your hairline and also has baby hairs to make your hairline look more natural. With the perfect install, the invisible lace at the front of the closure lays flat against your skin giving you a natural hairline and more natural weave overall. For some, it is the perfect finish to the best weave.

More

See our blog post & video, What is a Lace Closure? for more information about lace closures.

If you are unsure of how many bundles you would need for your weave hairstyle, or the length of hair you will need, check out our bundles guide, or our length chart.

entry.title: Kinky Curly Lace Frontal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada

Kinky Curly Lace Frontal

Our Kinky Curly texture is the perfect blend for the natural look. The texture is a tight spiral curl. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture.

Part in any direction with our 4"x 13" free part hand-tied lace frontal closure. Cover all of your natural hair for a full weave with no hair left out. Great protective style & very natural weave look.

What's it for?

Our hand tied lace frontal covers your hairline and also has baby hairs to make your hairline look more natural. Full ear to ear closure giving you the most natural weave hairline. With the perfect install, the invisible lace lays flat against your skin giving you a natural hairline and more natural weave overall. For some, it is the perfect finish to the best weave.

entry.title: Yaki Straight Lace Closure
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weave Got It Canada
Type: Lace Closure
Price: 115.00 - 185.00 (6 variants)

Yaki Straight Lace Closure

Our Yaki Straight hair is straight yet textured. This hair blends well with black textures hair that has been relaxed/permed. Very natural looking weave results are possible with this texture. This hair can easily be straightened or curled, and when washed it will return to its original texture.

What's it for?

For a full head of weave without hair left out, our 4"x 4" lace closures are perfect for closing the weave. Natural looking protective style weave closure with free, single, 3 & V part. 

Our hand tied lace closure covers the middle of your hair, including your hairline and also has baby hairs to make your hairline look more natural. With the perfect install, the invisible lace at the front of the closure lays flat against your skin giving you a natural hairline and more natural weave overall. For some, it is the perfect finish to the best weave.
